description: Shows Google Analytics GA4 metrics (Bounce Rate, Views, Users) for Astro Markdown pages and .astro files inline in VSCode
command.refresh.title: Refresh Data
command.testConnection.title: Test API Connection
command.configure.title: Configure
command.showDashboard.title: Open Dashboard
config.title: Astro Analytics
config.propertyId: Google Analytics GA4 Property ID (numeric). Set in settings to enable.
config.credentialsPath: Path to Google Application Default Credentials JSON file
config.lookbackDays: Number of days to look back for analytics data
config.contentRoot: Root folder of Astro content (.md/.mdx files) relative to workspace
config.pagesRoot: Root folder for Astro pages (.astro files) relative to workspace
config.dashboardMaxPages: Maximum number of pages shown in the dashboard (sorted by worst bounce rate first)
viewContainer.title: Astro Analytics
view.dashboard.name: Dashboard
